TABLE.NAME: zoomoodle
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the zoomoodle activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: coursemodule
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: recurring
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the meeting or webinar recurring?

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum grade (points possible) for this activity. Negative value indicates a scale being used.

TABLE.NAME: zoomoodle_urls
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the user's zoom login for a webinar.

FIELD.NAME: user
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: module
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course_module this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: zoom_user
FIELD.COMMENT: Zoom registrant ID for the user.

FIELD.NAME: zoom_url
FIELD.COMMENT: Zoom webinar URL for the user.
